name.jp: ライトジャパニーズピギー

description.en: This little piggy will follow you everywhere! Give it a sword, and it will fight demons with you!
description.ar: This little piggy will follow you everywhere! Give it a sword, and it will fight demons with you!
description.br: This little piggy will follow you everywhere! Give it a sword, and it will fight demons with you!
description.cns: This little piggy will follow you everywhere! Give it a sword, and it will fight demons with you!
description.de: Dieses kleine Schweinchen wird dir überallhin folgen! Gib ihm ein Schwert, und es wird mit dir gegen Dämonen kämpfen!
description.fi: This little piggy will follow you everywhere! Give it a sword, and it will fight demons with you!
description.fil: This little piggy will follow you everywhere! Give it a sword, and it will fight demons with you!
description.fr: Ce petit porcinet vous suivra partout ! Donnez lui une épée et il combatera les démons avec vous !
description.id: This little piggy will follow you everywhere! Give it a sword, and it will fight demons with you!
description.it: This little piggy will follow you everywhere! Give it a sword, and it will fight demons with you!
description.jp: この小さな豚はどこにでもついてきます!剣を与えれば、あなたと一緒に悪魔と戦うことができます!
description.kr: This little piggy will follow you everywhere! Give it a sword, and it will fight demons with you!

description.pl: This little piggy will follow you everywhere! Give it a sword, and it will fight demons with you!
description.ru: This little piggy will follow you everywhere! Give it a sword, and it will fight demons with you!
description.sp: ¡Este Cerdito te seguirá a todas partes! ¡Dale una espada y luchará contra los demonios contigo!
